metadata.name: ''Far from Heaven''
metadata.description:
You know how it works in the real world...
God bless the ideologies which provide sources for the industries!
 
Some symbolical refers in this piece are related to Marvel fandom; all dead Marvel characters have come back from heaven as the army of Jesus. 
''Far from Heaven'' also refers to the Spider-Man movie ''Far from Home'' .
Above all is Wanda, as a metaphor for media, who's been making all these illusions for us...

Shout out to the whole Marvel team!
